page.title: 05ROWHEATH FARM etc.
page.content: Rowheath Farm is an{arable}farm with around 98 acres. It is a{freehold}farm unlike many other{tenant}farms in the area, and grows{sugar-beet},{oil seed {rape},{wheat}and{barley.}The farm used to keep{pigs,}but this did not prove successful so they sold them. The third farm that we visited was Ampers Wick{beef}farm which breeds cattle. They sell their produce to store all over East Anglia. Finally we visited High Birch farm which used to farm{Peartree Pork {Products}but now farms chickens, beans and oats. They own 41 acres of land. The reason for the turn away from pork farming was the drop in sales a few years ago. All the farms have been affected by the weather and many are behind their proposed schedule.
